metadata.title: CVE-2022-29622 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An arbitrary file upload vulnerability in formidable v3.1.4 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted filename. NOTE: some third parties dispute this issue because the product has common use cases in which uploading arbitrary files is the desired behavior. Also, there are configuration options in all versions that can change the default behavior of how files are handled.

criterions.comment: node-formidable package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
